# parkerutils

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of parkerutils is to provide a central place to put common utility functions
I use in my day to day

## Installation

You can install the development version of parkerutils like so:

```{r eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("barnesparker/parkerutils")
```


## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example, eval=FALSE}
library(parkerutils)
## basic example code
```
